thread.section_title: Gardens NYC-an Affinia hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great for families
thread.title_full: Great for families - Review of Gardens NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Alana B
title: Great for families
text: We stayed in a junior suite and found the room to be plenty large for 2 adults and a 6 year old....could easily have had another kid in the room. The couch and livingroom area gave us plenty of breathing room for playing away from the bed and the kitchen amenities allowed us the comfort of casual meals in the room. Hotel is walking distance from Central Park and the Zoo, sidewalks are clean and quiet so this part of town is a respite after a day of sightseeing.
